00035 RangeServerClient::RangeServerClient(Comm *comm, uint32_t timeout_ms)
00036   : m_comm(comm), m_default_timeout_ms(timeout_ms), m_timeout_ms(0) {
00037   if (timeout_ms == 0)
00038     m_default_timeout_ms = get_i32("Hypertable.Request.Timeout");
00039 }

00045 void
00046 RangeServerClient::load_range(const sockaddr_in &addr,
00047     const TableIdentifier &table, const RangeSpec &range,
00048     const char *transfer_log, const RangeState &range_state,
00049     DispatchHandler *handler) {
00050   CommBufPtr cbp(RangeServerProtocol::create_request_load_range(table, range,
00051                  transfer_log, range_state));
00052   send_message(addr, cbp, handler);
00053 }
00054 
00055 void
00056 RangeServerClient::load_range(const sockaddr_in &addr,
00057     const TableIdentifier &table, const RangeSpec &range,
00058     const char *transfer_log, const RangeState &range_state) {
00059   DispatchHandlerSynchronizer sync_handler;
00060   EventPtr event_ptr;
00061   CommBufPtr cbp(RangeServerProtocol::create_request_load_range(table, range,
00062                  transfer_log, range_state));
00063   send_message(addr, cbp, &sync_handler);
00064 
00065   if (!sync_handler.wait_for_reply(event_ptr))
00066     HT_THROW((int)Protocol::response_code(event_ptr),
00067              String("RangeServer load_range() failure : ")
00068              + Protocol::string_format_message(event_ptr));
00069 }

00108 void
00109 RangeServerClient::create_scanner(const sockaddr_in &addr,
00110     const TableIdentifier &table, const RangeSpec &range,
00111     const ScanSpec &scan_spec, ScanBlock &scan_block) {
00112   DispatchHandlerSynchronizer sync_handler;
00113   EventPtr event_ptr;
00114   CommBufPtr cbp(RangeServerProtocol::create_request_create_scanner(table,
00115                  range, scan_spec));
00116   send_message(addr, cbp, &sync_handler);
00117 
00118   if (!sync_handler.wait_for_reply(event_ptr))
00119     HT_THROW((int)Protocol::response_code(event_ptr),
00120              String("RangeServer create_scanner() failure : ")
00121              + Protocol::string_format_message(event_ptr));
00122   else {
00123     HT_ASSERT(scan_block.load(event_ptr) == Error::OK);
00124   }
00125 }

00161 void
00162 RangeServerClient::fetch_scanblock(const sockaddr_in &addr, int scanner_id,
00163                                    ScanBlock &scan_block) {
00164   DispatchHandlerSynchronizer sync_handler;
00165   EventPtr event_ptr;
00166   CommBufPtr cbp(RangeServerProtocol::
00167                  create_request_fetch_scanblock(scanner_id));
00168   send_message(addr, cbp, &sync_handler);
00169 
00170   if (!sync_handler.wait_for_reply(event_ptr))
00171     HT_THROW((int)Protocol::response_code(event_ptr),
00172              String("RangeServer fetch_scanblock() failure : ")
00173              + Protocol::string_format_message(event_ptr));
00174   else {
00175     HT_EXPECT(scan_block.load(event_ptr) == Error::OK,
00176               Error::FAILED_EXPECTATION);
00177   }
00178 }

00247 void
00248 RangeServerClient::get_statistics(const sockaddr_in &addr,
00249                                   RangeServerStat &stat) {
00250   DispatchHandlerSynchronizer sync_handler;
00251   EventPtr event_ptr;
00252   CommBufPtr cbp(RangeServerProtocol::create_request_get_statistics());
00253   send_message(addr, cbp, &sync_handler);
00254 
00255   if (!sync_handler.wait_for_reply(event_ptr))
00256     HT_THROW((int)Protocol::response_code(event_ptr),
00257              String("RangeServer get_stats() failure : ")
00258              + Protocol::string_format_message(event_ptr));
00259 
00260   const uint8_t *decode_ptr = event_ptr->payload + 4;
00261   size_t decode_remain = event_ptr->payload_len - 4;
00262   stat.decode(&decode_ptr, &decode_remain);
00263 }

00306 
00307 void
00308 RangeServerClient::send_message(const sockaddr_in &addr, CommBufPtr &cbp,
00309                                 DispatchHandler *handler) {
00310   int error;
00311   uint32_t timeout_ms = (m_timeout_ms == 0) ? m_default_timeout_ms
00312                                             : m_timeout_ms;
00313   m_timeout_ms = 0;
00314 
00315   if ((error = m_comm->send_request(addr, timeout_ms, cbp, handler))
00316       != Error::OK) {
00317     HT_WARNF("Comm::send_request to %s failed - %s",
00318              InetAddr::format(addr).c_str(), Error::get_text(error));
00319     HT_THROWF(error, "Comm::send_request to %s failed",
00320               InetAddr::format(addr).c_str());
00321   }
00322 }
